ComicInfo.Penciller: Darren Douglas,Greg Staples,John Burns,Neil Googe,Patrick Goddard
ComicInfo.Summary:
Beware of geeks bearing gifs! The Survival Geeks return with close encounters of the nerd kind in Steampunk’d by Gordon Rennie, Emma Beeby, Neil Googe, and Gary Caldwell – only in this week’s 2000 AD! Also in this issue: The Order by Kek-W and John Burns, Judge Dredd: Dark Justice by John Wagner and Greg Staples; Savage: Grinders by Pat Mills and Patrick Goddard; and a new Tharg’s 3riller by Eddie Robson and Darren Douglas!
Cover: Rufus Dayglo
Judge Dredd - Dark Justice (Part Eight) (John Wagner - Greg Staples)Survival Geeks - Steampunk'd (Part One) (Gordon Rennie - Emma Beeby - Neil Googe)Tharg's 3rillers Presents Station To Station (Part One) (Eddie Robson - Darren Douglas)The Order (Part Eight) (Kek-W - John Burns)Savage Book 9 - Grinders (Part Eight) (Pat Mills - Patrick Goddard)
